com.tangosol.coherence.config.scheme.ViewScheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
BackingMapManagerBuilder, BuilderCustomization<ContinuousQueryCache>, MapBuilder, NamedCacheBuilder, ServiceBuilder, CachingScheme, ObservableCachingScheme, Scheme, ServiceScheme
public class ViewScheme extends AbstractCompositeScheme<ContinuousQueryCache>
A Scheme that realizes both services and caches for Coherence 12.2.1.4 feature named 'views'.
Since:
12.2.1.4
Author:
hr 2019.06.11
